name: Hecarim
title: the Shadow of War
shortBio: Hecarim is a spectral fusion of man and beast, cursed to ride down the souls of the living for all eternity. When the Blessed Isles fell into shadow, this proud knight was obliterated by the destructive energies of the Ruination, along with all his cavalry and their mounts. Now, whenever the Black Mist reaches out across Runeterra, he leads their devastating charge, reveling in the slaughter and crushing the foe beneath his armored hooves.

skins.name: Blood Knight Hecarim
skins.description: A zealous sycophant to his order, Hecarim unquestioningly serves the will of the Bloodstone. While less subtle than his masters would like, he is nonetheless effective in his purpose of executing enemies in a grisly fashion.

skins.name: Reaper Hecarim
skins.description: When the dead refuse to take their place among the Death Sworn, the spectral knight Hecarim rides them down with his scythe at the ready. In his wake charge countless subjugated spirits, now yearning for nothing more than the reaping of fresh and defiant souls.

skins.name: Headless Hecarim
skins.description: There are many tales told about creatures prowling the roads at night, but none are as dark as that of the headless rider. He lost his head in a duel on horseback, and is doomed to haunt the living forevermore—a hideous jack-o-lantern resting upon his shoulders.

skins.name: Arcade Hecarim
skins.description: An unlikely favorite among retro purists, Hecarim has remained one of the most popular characters of the arcade era. Now he stands against the combined forces of gaming's greatest villains, proving there's no hero more noble than a rainbow-shooting chrome centaur from 1978.

skins.name: Elderwood Hecarim
skins.description: His is armor of soft-spun summerwood and rowan—the stones upon him carved in a time before the old gods danced among the trees. Even now, Hecarim travels the shallow rivers and moss-flecked paths of the Elderwood, that ageless guardian who protects the forest from mankind's darkest yearnings.

skins.name: Worldbreaker Hecarim
skins.description: The third of four titans prophesied to shatter the world, Hecarim will begin his hunt when the moon smothers the sun. Riding from the south, his rampaging shadow will be cast across the land, infecting the living with dread and darkness.

skins.name: Lancer Zero Hecarim
skins.description: A mechanized sentinel called upon in times of war, Lancer Zero Hecarim is the protector of an ancient city—the last line of defense against the most fearsome opponents. Once unleashed, the damage it causes can be extraordinary, so it is always held back as a final, desperate gamble.

skins.name: High Noon Hecarim

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: When Heaven was destroyed by mortal men, it was only a matter of time until Hell overflowed onto the prairie, bringing with it all the devils who had waited so patiently to escape their confinement. Hecarim and his black riders revel in this newfound freedom, razing everything before them to ash as they stampede across the frontier.

skins.name: Cosmic Charger Hecarim

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A knight in the Queen's court, he leads his calvary across the sky, forever expanding the outer edge of creation—bringing new life wherever his hooves fall.

skins.name: Arcana Hecarim

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Enforcer of the Higher World, his ever-forward motion crushes those before him while carving new fates for those left in his wake. He seeks to stop Rakan of the Lower World and prevent the calamitous disaster that will result from a fated love blooming betwixt the stars.

skins.name: Winterblessed Hecarim

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

skins.description: "You are Polaris," answered Hecarim. With a voice hardened by centuries of servitude, he explained that Senna was the living embodiment of the Aurora; he, its protector. As each year passed, he guarded the borders in Polaris' absence while the new Winterblessed was chosen. It didn't matter who she was before, he told her: she'd been called to service now.

passive.name: Warpath
passive.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.

spells.name: Rampage
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for @Damage@ physical damage. If this Ability hits, he gains a stack that decreases its Cooldown by @RampageCooldownReduction@ seconds and increases its damage by @RampageBonusDamagePerc@% for @Effect6Amount@ seconds. Stacks up to @Effect2Amount@ times.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.description: Hecarim gains Armor and Magic Resist. Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies, and gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hecarim deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage over @BuffDuration@ seconds to nearby enemies.

Hecarim gains @ResistAmount@ Armor and Magic Resist and heals for @LeechAmount@% of damage nearby enemies take from Hecarim and @AllyTooltipLeachValue@% of damage taken from his allies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.dynamicDescription: Hecarim becomes Ghosted and gains <speed>@MinMoveSpeed*100@% Move Speed</speed> increasing to <speed>@MaxMoveSpeed*100@%</speed> over @Effect5Amount@ seconds. His next Attack <status>Knocks Back</status> and deals between <physicalDamage>@MinDamage@</physicalDamage> and <physicalDamage>@MaxDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>. <status>Knock Back</status> distance and damage scales with distance travelled during this Ability.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.dynamicDescription: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing <magicDamage>@DamageDone@ magic damage</magicDamage>. Hecarim unleashes a shockwave at the end of the charge that <status>Fears</status> for between @FearDurationMin@ to @FearDurationMax@ seconds, increased by charge distance.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
